subject: Golf
Phoenix Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: After shooting his worst round as a pro last week at the Phoenix Open, Woods tried to regain his mastery of his short game at Torrey Pines, where he has a history of success.
snippet: After shooting his worst round as a pro last week at the Phoenix Open, Woods tried to regain his mastery of his short game at Torrey Pines, where he has a history of success.
